snippet: Rob Parker, a panelist on the “First Take” program who was suspended last month for his racially oriented comments about Robert Griffin III, the rookie Redskins quarterback, did not have his contract renewed, ESPN said in a statement.
abstract: ESPN will not renew its contract with commentator Rob Parker, who was suspended for racially oriented comments he made about Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III.
lead_paragraph: Rob Parker, a panelist on the “First Take” program who was suspended last month for his racially oriented comments about Robert Griffin III, the rookie Redskins quarterback, did not have his contract renewed, ESPN said in a statement.
